title: elegant pen-drawn script font
author: whatsmytype

comments.content:
Burgues Script, by the amazing type foundry Sudtipos:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/burgues-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162435/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/burgues-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/burgues-script/") [with stylistic alternates]

You are superb! Thank you for all your help!
